sentences.en: Each of us will have our own criteria for success.
sentences.cn: 每个人对于成功都有自己的标准。

sentences.en: He describes several of the important design criteria.
sentences.cn: 他提出了几条主要的设计原则.
她的标准让人搞不明白。

sentences.en: It is hard to make out what criteria are used.
sentences.cn: 很难弄清楚使用的是什么样的标准。

sentences.en: It was necessary to satisfy stringent criteria to justify its use.
sentences.cn: 使用苛刻的标准来评价其实用性是完全必要的.

sentences.en: No attempt was made to formulate a complete list of all possible criteria in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文并不想对所有可能的准则列出全面的清单.

sentences.en: Non - morphological criteria of metastasizing potential are largely speculative.
sentences.cn: 非 形态学的转移潜力的指标大部分是随机性的.

sentences.en: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.
sentences.cn: 银行正重新评估其贷款标准。

sentences.en: The criteria of this social life are brutal.
sentences.cn: 这种社交生活中标尺是残酷无情的.

sentences.en: The focal length of the camera lens plays an important role in photo criteria.
sentences.cn: 摄影机镜头的焦距在摄影规范中起着重要的作用.

sentences.en: The intraparticle and interphase criteria are general.
sentences.cn: 颗粒内部和相间的准则是通用的.

sentences.en: The modified Mercalli scale is a pastiche of psychological, engineering, and geological criteria.
sentences.cn: 修飞的麦卡利烈度表是心理, 工程和地质标准的混合物.

sentences.en: The most important criterion for entry is that applicants must design and make their own work.
sentences.cn: 参加的最重要标准就是申请人必须设计并制作自己的作品。

sentences.en: There are strict criteria for inclusion in the competition.
There will be wailing and gnashing of teeth whatever criteria the Arts Council employ for this exercise.
sentences.cn: 无论艺术委员会采取哪种标准来评判这次训练，总会有人哀怨，有人气愤。

sentences.en: What criteria do you use when judging the quality of a student's work?
sentences.cn: 你评定学生功课好坏时用什么作标准?

phrases.tran_cn: 决策标准；决策衡量准则

trans.tran_cn: （批评、判断等的）标准，准则( criterion的名词复数 )，(criterion的复数)
trans.tran_en: A criterion is a factor on which you judge or decide something
A criterion is a factor on which you judge or decide something
